name: grass-gem
effect: Held : When the holder uses a damaging grass-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging grass-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text.black_white: A gem with an essence of nature. When held, it strengthens the power of a Grass-type move only once.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A gem with an essence of nature. When held, it strengthens the power of a Grass-type move only once.
